subject: Pedals and VAM PRO problem
description_text:
Good morning, I have a problem with the SIMSONN Pro Plus X pedal board. Today I received the VAM PRO but after connecting them they do not work. I installed Simsonn Menager 2.0.8 but now they are no longer recognized in the game.
What can I do?

Thanks,
Foggia Ivan

conversations.body_text: Hi Ivan Foggia, Our software currently supports 10 games. May I ask which game you are using now? We are continuously working to add telemetry support for more titles. In the meantime, you can use the internal version of SimHub that Iâ€™ve provided. The official release is still undergoing testing and may take a bit more time. https://drive.google.com/file/d/1QrSbAvCC5iyx9XgdRgSQV-hWpmDGkujc/view?usp=sharing

Hi, I play Le Mans Ultimate, I found that beta simhub version on reddit and I solved it this way.
Thanks
